name: MAGIC TURN (itch)
description:
Magic Turn is an ongoing personal project. The game goal is to collect herbs as much as possible while the collection panel continues to fall, and then get a higher score. It is inspired by the game Potion Craft: Alchemist Simulator, sad sam, the dance line.

This game still needs to make a mysterious potion by matching some materials.

Play time: 10-20 min

Controlls: WASD
